ranking_agent_examples.content:
UserInfo[123]
PredictRating[123, 1, pearson, user_based]
PredictRating[123, 2, pearson, user_based]
ItemInfo[1]
ItemInfo[2]
Finish[2, 1, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40]

ranking_agent_fewshot.content:
Suppose you need to rank candidates [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50] for user 123 and select top 10:
UserInfo[123]
PredictRating[123, 1, pearson, user_based] (suppose get 4.5)
PredictRating[123, 2, pearson, user_based] (suppose get 4.8)
PredictRating[123, 3, pearson, user_based] (suppose get 3.2)
ItemInfo[1]
ItemInfo[2]
Finish[2, 1, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40]

ranking_agent_hint.content: This is the final step. You should use Finish command to finish the task and return the ranked top items list.
